name: Duplicate role for the same contact name
description: Flags accounts that have multiple contacts with the same name assigned to the same role.

name: Missing contact role
description: Alerts when an account-contact relationship does not specify a role.

name: Same contact name with different roles
description: Highlights contacts with the same name assigned to multiple roles for a single account.

name: Duplicate contact phone numbers
description: Detects duplicate phone numbers for a contact.

name: Duplicate contact email addresses
description: Detects duplicate email addresses for a contact.
